about_the_game:
Story & Background

Love n dream 3 will bring you a unique experience of David's adventure to a new land. The gameplay focuses on dating sim, solving the puzzle, and understanding the story of all unique character plots.

You, as David, a new shine adventure who wants to experience the world by yourself, had traveled to a new land. However, life is unexpected, you don't have enough cash to survive day by day in Zenyh City. You came to know that there is a Commissioner who gives tasks to adventurers. From now on, your journey is begin.

Features

  • 5 gorgeous girls with different personalities, preferences, and backgrounds. You will experience their story, life, and so on.
  • Unique match-3 puzzle with the right decision-making to optimize your date and bring your date to the next level.
  • Shopping system to gift food and items to the girls.
  • Many kawaii girls from different style are waiting for you!!
  • Various interactions follow up with the character.
  • Beatiful backgrounds and artworks await with a mixture of Asian and Western styles from our talented artist.
  • Relax and chill music.
  • Good luck and happy dating!!

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Sexual Content or General Mature Content. All characters involved in sexual content are over 18 years old.

name: Love n Dream 3 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: 《Love n Dream 3》is a match-3 puzzle game with dating elements. Your job is to complete all the missions and adventures around you to help all the girls on your journey.
